revised_title: Forest Disturbance and Recovery in Sabah, Malaysia: The Danum Valley Conservation Area
tldr: The article discusses forest land-use in Sabah, Malaysia, focusing on the Danum Valley Conservation Area. It highlights the main agent of forest disturbance, the timber industry, and its impact on the forest. The article also provides a summary account of the ecology of the Danum Valley Conservation Area and the challenges and opportunities it presents for ecological research.
